column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Let's get to the point... Lou's is the best pizza in town. Its better than Uno's
column2: Giardano's and is leagues better than Gino's East (which sucks). What makes Lou's so great is that they don't skimp on the cheese
column3: which can often be the case with Chicago-style pizza. Just remember... always go one size down when ordering if you're used to traditional pizza. Chicago-style pizza is super filling.
